oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tamme's father's heart aches so his mother tells his father to sleep in ashes. His father does as she says and becomes white from the ashes. 1) See also Customs at death and Burial, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-3.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sleeping in ashes
